* Iron Raptor had also watched Ramhorn leave and shook her head, she hadn't understood a word he had said but she knew that they weren't meant to be comments!
She nodded at Prowl's words and then began towards the War room, it was stressful on all of then...even more on some.
Iron Raptor looked back at Prowl with a doubtful look in her optics, she was beginning to feel the Maximals were loosing their touch of victory...or already had.
It was a sad thing to imagine that, but it would also explain why there was such low hopes in the base.
But it would be at this meeting that she hoped to bring up all of their spirits, and the base defences as well. Hopefully!
She wasn't sure if any of the Maximal would like a buddy system where they were partnered up, or even the suggestion of copying the Predacon's defence systems in order to strengthen their own. In the long run both plans just might work, but in the short they could end up as big failures.
Iron Raptor shook her head, the look on her face even more doubtful them before. She knew that she had to try, if the plans did fail then they would be no worse off.
She came to the War room and placed a hand on it's door,she had to try.
With a heavy sigh the doors then slid open but she walked in slowly, her murkiness clearly shown in her posture as she stood aside and waited for Prowl to enter.*
